name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided™ - VR Experience
detailed_description: Discover four iconic environments from Deus Ex: Mankind Divided, for the first time in virtual reality. Take in the stunning level of detail of locations from Dubai and Golem City, as well as Adam Jensen’s apartment, powered by the Dawn Engine and the franchise’s renowned art direction. The Deus Ex VR Experience also lets you examine up-close a selection of 3D models of main characters and NPCs from the game.
about_the_game: Discover four iconic environments from Deus Ex: Mankind Divided, for the first time in virtual reality. Take in the stunning level of detail of locations from Dubai and Golem City, as well as Adam Jensen’s apartment, powered by the Dawn Engine and the franchise’s renowned art direction. The Deus Ex VR Experience also lets you examine up-close a selection of 3D models of main characters and NPCs from the game.
short_description: Discover four iconic environments from Deus Ex: Mankind Divided, for the first time in virtual reality.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7.1SP1 or above (64-bit Operating System Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
